channel.title: Get stuck when jumping onto ledges
channel.description:
Throughout the game so far I keep getting stuck when jumping up onto things. I'm not sure if it has something to do with the auto crouch-jump feature.
It happened most frequently on the On a Rail chapter, when jumping up from the track to the walkways on either side. I get stuck on the platform's edge, and have to do a combination of wiggling directions and jumping and crouching to be released. It's gotten me badly hurt in firefights more than once since I suddenly stop moving.
